short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Source and qualify candidates anywhere you find them on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Proactive recruiting requires you to go out and search everywhere for the ideal candidate, rather than wait for them to come to you. With the Hello Talent extension for Google Chrome you can source candidates from anywhere you find them on the web and add them to collaborative talent pools. 

The process is simple - see the profile, activate the extension, and kablam! â€“ the profile is automatically imported* and into the selected pool in Hello Talent. After adding the profile you can continue to use the extension to enrich it with tags, status updates, ratings, and comments. 

To learn more about Hello Talent visit https://app.hellotalent.com or email us at support@hellotalent.com.
